word:
MR No. 321 - Ellen G. White and SDA Education

     I want all our teachers and students to have this book [Education] as soon as they possibly can. I can hardly await the process of publication. I want the principles contained in this book to go everywhere. We must take a higher stand on education.--Letter 58, 1900, pp. 1, 2. (To Elder and Mrs. G. B. Starr, April 11, 1900.)
